text: Tarapara amara tara kache ohi pathalama, â€˜apani amadera caksusa tattbabadhana o amadera ohi anuyayi nauyana nirmana karuna, tarapara yakhana amadera adesa asabe ebam ununa [1] uthale uthabe, takhana uthiye nebena pratyeka jibera eka eka jora ebam apanara paribara-parijanake, taderake chara yadera birud'dhe age sid'dhanta hayeche. Ara tadera samparke apani amake kichu balabena na yara yuluma kareche. Tara to nimajjita habe
